common.cookieWarn: This site uses cookies to deliver its services and analyze traffic. Your IP address and user-agent are shared with Google along with performance and security metrics to ensure quality of service, generate usage statistics, and to detect and address abuse.

info.title: Choose a category
info.li1: Select the place where the service company you want to complain about acts
info.li2: If you are victim of a theft, click on the Theft category

info.title: Choisissez une categorie
info.li2: Si vous voulez vous plaindre d'un mauvais service de l'état cliquez sur Ville

info.title: Search for the business
info.li3: Note : if the business is a website, just type the country where you are

info.title: Choose a subcategory
info.li1: Select the field where the service company you want to complain about acts
info.li2: If you are victim of a theft, click on the Theft category

info.title: Read more about us on Indiegogo
info.li1: Help us extend the platform to other types of complaints like city life quality and product quality
info.li2: Get 100% argan oil directly imported from the only place in the world it grows in and made by locals, collected by a cooperative in Morocco
info.li3: Talk about us in your blog, vlog or other media and let us know about it, we want to thank you by linking to your page on our credits page

add.title: Subject
add.detailsPh: You can detail more your issue : with who did you talk, how long are you seeking for a solution...
add.videoPh: Copiez et collez l'adresse d'une video youtube, vimeo ou autre ici
add.issueOpenEditionDisabled: This issue become public, you cannot edit it anymore
add.attachmentsToRemoveTitle: these images will be removed on confirm

more.empty: This company still has no complaints

complaint.privateIconHint: this issue remains in private mode for a week before going public
complaint.likesIconHint: the times this issue was liked
complaint.similarIssueIconHint: the this this issue was marked as similar to someone else's

service.title: Bad service
service.short-desc: If you purchased a service you are not satisfied with, make the company react rapidly to your complaint: complain publicly here to make your issue visible to google and everybody who searches for info about that company in the world, as long as you did not flag your issue as 'solved', it will remain in the list of the company's unsolved customer issues

city.title: Theft or agression
city.short-desc: Coming next : If you were victim of a theft, agression or other issue that should be handled by the public services, you can report it here so that people can have real statistics about city happiness. People moving to a new home will be able to choose the right quarter for their family, and the mayor of each rural area will be judged against factual numbers reflecting his efficiency
city.short-desc1: If you were victim of a theft or agression, people must know that the quarter it happened in is not safe. People moving to a new home will be able to choose the right quarter for his family, and the mayor of each rural area will be judged against factual numbers

product.title: Bad product
product.short-desc: Coming next: If a product you purchased shows to be of bad quality or durability, you can reference it here to share your experience and exchange about solutions and alternatives. You will be able to compare brands by the average quality of their products while putting pressure on manufacturers to make them have more reliable offers

add.notLogged: You must <1>login</1> to add a comment

complaintActionList.empty: there are no comments, be the first to react to this complaint
